name: KonaCleaners
0:
”Alexa, open Kona Cleaners.”
”Alexa, tell Kona Cleaners that I am on my way.”
”Alexa, ask Kona Cleaners to pick up my clothes.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kona cleaners
Developer Terms of Use
des: Dry cleaning and laundry has never been easier! Simply have Alexa tell Kona Cleaners that "I'm on my way" and all of your clothers will be pulled, ready and waiting for you when you come in. You can even ask to have Kona Cleaners schedule a free route pickup and Alexa will let you know when your next driver will be by. The Kona Alexa skill is indeed the easiest way to dry clean.
